class.name: GaussianFitterTest

javadoc.text: Poor data: right of peak not symmetric with left of peak.
Poor data: right of peak is missing.
Zero points is not enough observed points.
Two points is not enough observed points.
Poor data: right of peak not symmetric with left of peak.
Poor data: right of peak is missing.

method.name: testMath519
method.comment: The optimizer will try negative sigma values but "GaussianFitter"
will catch the raised exceptions and return NaN values instead.

method.name: testMath798
method.comment: When the data points are not commented out below, the fit stalls.
This is expected however, since the whole dataset hardly looks like
When commented out, the fit proceeds fine.
Values are copied from a previous run of this test.

javadoc.text: Adds the specified points to specified GaussianFitter * instance.
javadoc.param: points data points where first dimension is a point index and * second dimension is an array of length two representing the point * with the first value corresponding to X and the second value * corresponding to Y
fitter fitter to which the points in points should be * added as observed points
